commandDescription: deploy data from CSV files to a Salesforce org
deploydirFlagDescription: directory containing the deployment descriptor 'datadeploy.json' (default: current working directory)
waitperobjectFlagDescription: number of minutes to wait for each bulk API job (default: 5 minutes)
infoDeployingRecordsFromFile: Deploying %s records for sObject '%s' from file '%s' waiting at most %s minutes
errorDataFileNotFound: Data file for sObject '%s' not found: %s
errorDataFileNotReadable: Data file for sObject '%s' is not readable. Error: %s
errorDeployRecordFailed: Deployment of record failed with error: %s
errorDeploySomeRecordFailed: At least one record failed to deploy.
errorDeployDataFailed: Data for sObject '%s' failed to deploy. Error: %s
